trans-unit.source: Provides access to and organizes files uploaded by a client.
trans-unit.target: 提供对访问权限并组织这些客户端上载的文件。

trans-unit.source: Clients encode files and transmit them in the content body using multipart MIME format with an HTTP `Content-Type` header of `multipart/form-data`.
trans-unit.target: 客户端对文件进行编码，并将它们传输中使用多部分 MIME 格式，并返回 HTTP 内容主体`Content-Type`标头的`multipart/form-data`。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET extracts the encoded file(s) from the content body into individual members of an HttpFileCollection.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 将从内容主体的编码的文件提取到 HttpFileCollection 的各个成员中。

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile> class provide access to the contents and properties of each file.
trans-unit.target: 方法和属性<xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile>类提供对内容和属性的每个文件的访问。</xref:System.Web.HttpPostedFile>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string array containing the keys (names) of all members in the file collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串数组，包含的文件集合中的所有成员的键 （名称）。

trans-unit.source: An array of file names.
trans-unit.target: 文件名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: Copies members of the file collection to an <xref:System.Array> beginning at the specified index of the array.
trans-unit.target: 将复制到的文件集合的成员<xref:System.Array>数组的指定索引处开始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: 目标<xref:System.Array>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index of the destination array where copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 开始复制的目标数组的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Web.HttpPostedFile"></xref> object with the specified numerical index from the file collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Web.HttpPostedFile"></xref>具有文件收集从指定的数字索引的对象。

trans-unit.source: The index of the object to be returned from the file collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从文件集合中返回的对象的索引。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpPostedFile"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpPostedFile"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Web.HttpPostedFile"></xref> object with the specified name from the file collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Web.HttpPostedFile"></xref>具有指定名称从文件集合对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object to be returned from a file collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从文件集合返回的对象名称。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpPostedFile"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpPostedFile"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpFileCollection"></xref> member with the specified numerical index.
trans-unit.target: 返回的名称<xref href="System.Web.HttpFileCollection"></xref>成员具有指定的数字索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the object name to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的对象名称的索引。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member specified by index.
trans-unit.target: 名称由指定成员 index 。

trans-unit.source: Returns all files that match the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定的名称匹配的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new collection instance each time it is called.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个新的集合实例每次调用时。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called once per name per request.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应调用一次每个每个请求的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name to match.
trans-unit.target: 要匹配的名称。

trans-unit.source: The collection of files.
trans-unit.target: 文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object with the specified numerical index from the <xref href="System.Web.HttpFileCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有从指定的数字索引的对象<xref href="System.Web.HttpFileCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to get from the file collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从文件集合中获取的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The specified by index.
trans-unit.target: The specified by index.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object with the specified name from the file collection.
trans-unit.target: 从文件集合中获取具有指定名称的对象。

trans-unit.source: Name of item to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的项的名称。

trans-unit.source: The specified by name.
trans-unit.target: The specified by name.
